extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains actions for getting dependencies from NuGet, creating a NuGet package, and publishing packages to NuGet.

actionInfo.name: Set Release Notes
actionInfo.summary: Writes release notes to a .nuspec file using BuildMaster's release notes or the Application's issue tracker.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
Action Fields

Release Notes Source

Select whether to generate release notes from BuildMaster's Application Release Notes, the Application's associated Issue Tracker, or both.

Nuspec File

The name of the .nuspec file where the release notes will be written to. This file name is relative to the source directory.

Action Fields

Package

Package to publish using NuGet. If a relative path is used, it is relative to the source directory.

Server Configuration

The API Key and server URL used to publish the package.

Action Fields

Project or Nuspec

Provide the nuspec file or msbuild project file that will act as the source of the NuGet package. If a relative path is used, it is relative to the source path.

Version

Specify a version for the NuGet package. If not specified, the version in the nuspec file will be used.

Properties

Provide additional properties to pass to NuGet. Use the format Property=Value (one per line). For example:
Configuration=Release

Options

Additional options for controlling package creation such as verbose logging, whether to include symbols in the package, and if the project should be built.

actionInfo.name: Install NuGet Packages
actionInfo.summary: Installs NuGet packages specified by a packages.config file.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
Action Fields

Package Source

Provide the URL of the package source. If not specified, all sources in %AppData%\NuGet\NuGet.config are used.

Packages

Provide the location of the packages.config file. If a relative path is used, it is relative to the source path.
